# massProperties

**Instance Property**

The physics body’s mass properties, like inertia and center of mass.

## Declaration

```swift
var massProperties: PhysicsMassProperties
```

## Discussion

By default, the mass properties value is [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PhysicsMassProperties/default], which matches the properties of a unit sphere with mass of 1 kilogram.
title: massProperties
